fields.title: Jump Delay
fields.description: Delay in seconds after landing when using the slime move control. Can be a single number, an array [min, max], or an object with range_min and range_max.

note: In order to follow targets, this entity must have the `minecraft:behavior.slime_attack` component, otherwise the entity will jump in the direction it's looking in.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Jump Movement
generated_doNotEdit.description: Move control that causes the mob to jump as it moves with a specified delay between jumps.

fields.title: Jump Delay
fields.description: Delay after landing when using the slime move control.

fields.title: Max Turn
fields.description: The maximum number in degrees the mob can turn per tick.
